pages.text: $(item)Flower Salad$() is a Vegetable Food item cooked in the $(pot)Crock Pot$() by combining at least 1 $(item)Chorus Flower$() with any $(thing)Vegetables$() with a total value of 1.5 or higher. $(item)Flower Salad$() excludes any $(thing)Fruits$(), $(thing)Meats$(), $(thing)Eggs$(), $(thing)Sweeteners$() or $(thing)Inedibles$() as filler. It takes 10 seconds to cook.
